name: Willform Deploy Agent
description: Deploy and manage containerized applications on Kubernetes with pay-per-use billing via x402 payment protocol. Supports four workload types: web apps, databases (StatefulSet with persistent volumes), background workers, and scheduled cronjobs. Includes per-namespace AI agent (Willy) for infrastructure operations.

skills.name: Create Deployment
skills.description: Deploy containers to Kubernetes using web-app, stateful-db, worker, or cronjob chart types. Includes pre-deployment validation, cost estimation, and automatic domain assignment.
examples: Deploy nginx:latest as a web app
Deploy postgres:16 as a stateful database with 20GB persistent volume
Deploy a background worker for queue processing
Schedule a cronjob to run every hour

skills.name: Manage Deployments
skills.description: Full lifecycle management: status, stop, restart, scale replicas, update environment variables, diagnose failures, view logs and Kubernetes events.
examples: Show deployment status
Scale to 3 replicas
Update DATABASE_URL env var
Diagnose why my deployment is failing
Get deployment logs

skills.name: Expose Database Externally
skills.description: Expose stateful-db deployments externally via Cloudflare Tunnel for local client access (psql, redis-cli). Supports HTTP and TCP protocols.
examples: Expose my PostgreSQL database for local access
Remove external access from my Redis instance

skills.name: Manage Namespaces
skills.description: Create, update, suspend, resume, and delete Kubernetes namespaces with resource quota management.
examples: Create a namespace with 4 CPU cores
Suspend all deployments in my namespace
Resume namespace after adding credits

skills.name: Credits & Billing
skills.description: Check credit balance, view transaction history, and monitor compute/memory/storage charges.
examples: Check my balance
How much am I spending per hour?

skills.name: Custom Domains
skills.description: Add and remove custom domains for web-app deployments with DNS verification.
examples: Add custom domain app.example.com to my deployment
Remove custom domain

skills.name: Namespace AI Agent
skills.description: Interact with the per-namespace Willy AI agent for infrastructure operations, tool invocation, and chat-based management.
examples: Ask the agent to check pod health
Invoke agent tool to list running services

author: Willform

pricing.details: x402 USDC payment protocol. Compute: $0.04/core/hr, Memory: $0.005/GB/hr, Storage: $0.0001/GB/hr. Min top-up $20, max $100 per payment. Pre-launch: not yet publicly available.
